oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Armstrong Tire Company, Madison, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Southeast division plant of Armstrong Rubber Company, located in Madison, Tennessee. This manufacturing plant produced radial tires as well as the “Rhino-Flex” tractor tires that were built “tough as a rhino” for farm machinery. Pirelli bought the Madison, Tennessee plant from Armstrong in 1988. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative, filmstrip: b & w.
